text: Penry may refer to: == Surname == *David Penry-Davey (1942–2015), Judge of the High Court of England and Wales *John Penry (1559–1593), Welsh Protestant *Johnny Paul Penry (born 1956), American rapist *Josh Penry (born 1976) American politician *Mary Penry (1735–1804), Welsh-born woman in colonial Pennsylvania *Peter Penry-Jones (1938–2009), Welsh actor *Richard Allen Penry (1948–1994), United States Army soldier *Rupert Penry-Jones (born 1970), English actor == Given name == *Penry Powell Palfrey (1830–1902), British stained glass designer and painter *Penry Williams (1866–1945), English politician *Penry Williams (artist) (1802–1885), Welsh artist == See also == *Penry v. Johnson, 532 U.S. 782 (2001), is a United States Supreme Court *Penry v. Lynaugh, 492 U.S. 302 (1989), sanctioned the death penalty for mentally disabled offenders
title: Penry
